metadata.title: CVE-2021-22214 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: When requests to the internal network for webhooks are enabled, aserver-side request forgery vulnerability in GitLab CE/EE affecting allversions starting from 10.5 was possible to exploit for an unauthenticatedattacker even on a GitLab instance where registration is limited

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
